## Includes

```{r}
source(here::here('R/shared.R'))
```

## Notes

-  not %in% doesn't drop NAs but != does  
-  nb don't need c() if you only have a single value 
 




## Example

```{r}
cheshire_petitions |> 
  filter(!petition_gender %in% "f") # 481 
 
cheshire_petitions |> 
  filter(petition_gender !="f") # 381 

```
